name: Wall Pushup
how_to_perform:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your body close to a wall.

2. Place both hands on the wall, shoulder-width apart, about shoulder height or slightly lower than that.

3. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine, ensuring that your hips do not sag or pike upwards throughout the movement.

4. Bend your elbows and lower your body toward the wall by keeping your arms close to your sides and your shoulders relaxed.

5. Stop lowering yourself when you feel a mild strain in your chest muscles.

6. Push back up to the starting position slowly while maintaining control throughout the movement.

7. Keep alternating between upper and lower positions during each repetition.
short_summary: A modified pushup exercise performed against a wall for individuals looking to add variety to their workout routine or who may struggle with traditional pushups.
